  • Constructor Details

    • Replicate

      public Replicate(int xRow, int yColumn, int xPosition, int yPosition, String color)
      Constructor for objects of class Replicate.
      Parameters:
      xRow - The number of rows in the grid.
      yColumn - The number of columns in the grid.
      xPosition - The x-coordinate of the cell to be colored.
      yPosition - The y-coordinate of the cell to be colored.
      color - The color of the cell to be colored.

    • Replicate

      Parameters:
      xRow - The number of rows in the grid.
      yColumn - The number of columns in the grid.
      color - The color of the cell to be colored.

  • Method Details

    • changeColor

      public void changeColor(int xPos, int yPos, int check)
      Changes the color of the hexagon at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xPos - The x-coordinate of the hexagon.
      yPos - The y-coordinate of the hexagon.
      check - The current state of the hexagon (1 for alive, 0 for dead).

    • neighbor

      public static int neighbor(int[][] matrix, int xPos, int yPos)
      Calculates the number of neighbors of a cell in a matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix of cells.
      xPos - The x-coordinate of the cell.
      yPos - The y-coordinate of the cell.
      Returns:
      The number of neighbors of the cell.

    • updateMatrixOneZero

      public void updateMatrixOneZero(int xPos, int yPos, int check)
      Updates the state of a cell in the state matrix.
      Parameters:
      xPos - The x-coordinate of the cell.
      yPos - The y-coordinate of the cell.
      check - The new state of the cell (1 for alive, 0 for dead).

    • replicate

      public void replicate()
      Replicates the state of the grid. This method iterates over the grid and changes the color of each cell based on the number of live neighbors it has.

    • invertColumns

      public static void invertColumns(int[][] matrix)
      Inverts the columns of a matrix. This method iterates over the matrix and swaps the values of each column with the values of the corresponding column in the opposite direction.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix to be inverted.

    • invertRows

      public static void invertRows(int[][] matrix)
      invert the rows of a matrix
      Parameters:
      matrix - to be inverted

    • newBoard

      public void newBoard(int[][] matrix)
      Updates the board based on the current state of the matrix. This method iterates over the matrix and changes the color of each cell in the grid to match the value in the matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix that contains the current state of the board.

    • reflectHorizontal

      public void reflectHorizontal()
      Reflect horizontality the current board.

    • reflectVertical

      public void reflectVertical()
      Reflect verticaly the current board.
